Title: Bastille Day
Plot: The fleet has found a source of water, but who will take on the difficult and dangerous job of mining it from the icy planet? Commander Adama and President Roslin send Lee to the Astral Queen, a prisoner transport ship, with an offer for its inmates: Volunteer for this mission and earn "freedom points".
GuestStars: Richard Hatch, Connor Widdows, Nicki Clyne, Colby Johannson
